Overview.name: osr_hospital_vdc
Overview.description: This VDC provides information about biographical data and blood tests of the patients of Ospedale San Raffaele in Milan

Data_Sources.description: Minio source containing blood tests for the hospital patients
Relational database containing biographical data for the hospital patients

Deployment.name: Computation blueprints for SPART MANUFACTURING plant

get.description: This method returns the biographical data for the specified patient (identified via SSN), to be used by medical doctors

get.summary: Get patient's latest values for all measured components
get.description: This method returns the latest values of all the blood test components measured on a patient (identified by his SSN), to be used by medical doctors

200.description: Latest values of all blood test components measured on the patient

get.summary: Get timeseries of patient's blood test component
get.description: This method returns the collected values for a specific blood test component of a patient (identified by his SSN), to be used by medical doctors

parameters.name: component
parameters.description: Blood test component for which the values are requested

200.description: Values for the specified blood test component in the patient's blood tests

get.summary: Get average of component over an age range
get.description: This method returns the average value for a specific blood test component in a specific age range, to be used by researchers. Since data are for researchers, patients' identifiers and quasi-identifiers won't be returned, making the output of this method anonymized.

parameters.name: component
parameters.description: Blood test component for which the last value is requested

200.description: Average value for the specified component in the selected age range
